00024 #include <algorithm>
00025 #include "base/uvm_factory.h"
00026 #include "base/uvm_barrier.h"
00027 
00028 namespace uvm {
00029 
00030 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Constructor: uvm_barrier
00032 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 uvm_barrier::uvm_barrier(const std::string & name) :
00034     _n_barriers(0),
00035     _name(name),
00036     _drain_time(SC_ZERO_TIME)
00037 {
00038     
00039     puvm_barrier_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00040 
00041     p_callback_agent = new uvm_barrier_callback_agent();
00042     _callback_map[BARRIER_RAISE] = p_callback_agent;
00043 
00044     p_callback_agent = new uvm_barrier_callback_agent();
00045     _callback_map[BARRIER_DROP] = p_callback_agent;
00046 
00047     p_callback_agent = new uvm_barrier_callback_agent();
00048     _callback_map[BARRIER_ALL_DROP] = p_callback_agent;
00049 }
00050 
00051 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 // Destructor: uvm_barrier
00053 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 uvm_barrier::~uvm_barrier()
00055 {
00056     _callback_map.clear();
00057 }
00058 
00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 // Function: wait
00061 //  Wait until all barriers have been dropped.
00062 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void uvm_barrier::wait(void)
00064 {
00065     if ( _n_barriers )
00066         ::sc_core::wait(_barrier_event);
00067     else
00068         _barrier_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00069 }
00070 
00071 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 // Function: get_num_barrier
00073 //   Returns the number of barrier that are still raised.
00074 //
00075 // Returns:
00076 //  Number of barriers (int)
00077 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 int uvm_barrier::get_num_barriers(void)
00079 {
00080     return _n_barriers;
00081 }
00082 
00083 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // Function: raise_barrier
00085 //   Raise barrier
00086 //
00087 // Parameters:
00088 //  count - number of barriers to raise (int)
00089 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 void uvm_barrier::raise_barrier(int count)
00091 {
00092      _n_barriers += count;
00093      _raise_event.notify();
00094 
00095      puvm_barrier_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00096      p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_RAISE];
00097      p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00098 }
00099 
00100 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 // Function: drop_barrier
00102 //   Drop barrier
00103 //
00104 // Parameters:
00105 //  count - number of barriers to drop (int)
00106 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void uvm_barrier::drop_barrier(int count)
00108 {
00109      if (_n_barriers >= count)
00110          _n_barriers -= count;
00111      else
00112         SC_REPORT_ERROR(100, "uvm_barrier::drop_barrier - barrier count drop below zero");
00113         //SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_ERROR_ID, "uvm_barrier::drop_barrier - barrier count drop below zero");
00114          
00115      puvm_barrier_callback_agent p_callback_agent;
00116      p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_DROP];
00117      p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00118 
00119      if (_n_barriers == 0)
00120      {
00121         p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_ALL_DROP];
00122         p_callback_agent->notify(this);
00123      }
00124 
00125      _drop_event.notify();
00126      if (!_n_barriers)
00127          wait_drain_time();
00128 }
00129 
00130 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 // Function: set_drain_time
00132 //   Set the Drain time for the barrier
00133 //
00134 // Parameters:
00135 //  drain_time - the amount of time to wait after all barriers have been dropped
00136 //               before notifying event (sc_time)
00137 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void uvm_barrier::set_drain_time (sc_core::sc_time drain_time)
00139 {
00140     _drain_time = drain_time;
00141 }
00142 
00143 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 // Function: get_drain_time
00145 //   Returns the drain time
00146 //
00147 // Returns:
00148 //  drain_time - the amount of time to wait after all barriers have been dropped
00149 //               before notifying event (sc_time)
00150 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 sc_core::sc_time uvm_barrier::get_drain_time(void)
00152 {
00153     return _drain_time;
00154 }
00155 
00156 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 // Function: wait_drain_time
00158 //   Wait a specified amount of time before triggering all barrier has been dropped
00159 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 void uvm_barrier::wait_drain_time()
00161 {
00162     if (_drain_time != SC_ZERO_TIME)
00163         sc_core::wait(_drain_time, _raise_event);
00164 
00165      if (!_n_barriers)
00166          _barrier_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 // Function : get_callback_agent()
00172 //   - get a pointer to a particular callback agent
00173 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 puvm_barrier_callback_agent uvm_barrier::get_callback_agent(uvm_barrier_cb_type barrier_action)
00175 {
00176   return _callback_map[barrier_action];
00177 }
